text: E datɨrɨghɨn gumazir aruabar mɨn akaba baragh egh da bagh mangam, egh Kraisɨn adarazir mɨgɨrɨgɨar faragha iniziba ataghragham. E kamaghɨn damu, mati kar dɨpenir akɨniba dughiar avɨribar da kunvɨra ikiam, egh e kamaghɨn damuvɨra ikɨ dɨpenim okoreghan kogham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, mɨgɨrɨgɨar arazir oveghamiba ategh naviba igheghamiba ko, mɨgɨrɨgɨar nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn ikiamiba ko, rurir mɨgɨrɨgɨaba ko dafariba gumazibagh isɨn arɨzir mɨgɨrɨgɨaba ko, gumazamizir ovegha ua dɨkavizibar mɨgɨrɨgɨaba ko, God gumazamizibar araziba tuisɨghtɨ an akar kam zurara ikɨvɨra ikiamin mɨgɨrɨgɨaba, e mɨgɨrɨgɨar kaba da ateghtɨ da ikiam.(6:1-2) Ezɨ rurir guar avɨribagh isir arazimɨn akar kam, a Grighɨn akamɨn deragha otozir puvatɨ. Gumazir maba kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, akar kam Kraisɨn adarazir rurim mɨgeir puvatɨ. A Judabar arazir me gɨn ghua ruasa Godɨn damazimɨn zuezir akam mɨgei.
